thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Brian Day

author: Brian Day
title: Brian Day
text: I ordered on line had prompt delivery, there was an item missing from the order but when I contacted them they were so awesome correcting it and very quickly. Am over the moon with there products and would recommend them to anyone which I have been doing. Well done guys on running the company in the old fashioned way with looking after the customer hard to find in this day and age. Clearly the staff have respect for the company as it shines through to the consumer. Five stars for sure. Look forward to exploring more of your products. Thanks a million.
